abstract: Morgan Stanley by any measure is a safe and solid investment bank. Except for one: The amount of trust people have in the whole financial and political system. It’s just about zero.
snippet: Morgan Stanley by any measure is a safe and solid investment bank. Except for one: The amount of trust people have in the whole financial and political system. It’s just about zero.
lead_paragraph: By almost any measure, Morgan Stanley is fine.

headline.main: Between the Lines, Wall St. Banks Face a Deficit of Trust

abstract: Occupy Wall Street is again taking aim at JPMorgan Chase’s chief executive. One problem, though — their demonstration isn’t taking place outside his office.
snippet: Occupy Wall Street is again taking aim at JPMorgan Chase’s chief executive. One problem, though — their demonstration isn’t taking place outside his office.
lead_paragraph: The nearly month-old Occupy Wall Street protest has apparently settled on a favorite target for their ire, Jamie Dimon. On Tuesday, protestors marched to his apartment building in Manhattan’s Upper East Side, bearing a giant fake check critiquing the low taxes of America’s wealthiest individuals.

headline.main: Protesters Take Aim at Dimon, but Miss His Office

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
